creator: rajcse.nitw@gmail.com
text:
Hi,

We ship a product which uses Apache 2.2.14. Now, the Customer is reporting that Apache is not PCI(Payment Card Industry) compliant. 

Can you please confirm if this is a problem or not. And if it is problem, is the fix already available for this? If not, when do you plan to roll this fix out.

Please reply to this ASAP as this is now a blocker for Customer in using our product.

Thanks and Regards
Pranay

creator: covener@gmail.com
text:
Bugzilla is for reporting bugs, not for advice on configuring Apace to conform to a security standard or off-loading your support obligations.

If you want to discuss specific clauses in PCI or specific failures, try the user support list users@httpd.apache.org.
